Comment.val: */The first field from the XML table that needs to be checked/nullified/*
*/The last field from the XML table that needs to be checked/nullified/*

*/Function to check for empty fields in a XML table, the number of the first non-optional empty field is returned. Empty optional fields are Nullified. Optional fields should be denoted by the '_OPT' suffix./*
/*This function validates the incoming XML against the XSD named in the schema location, validation errors are written into the responses parameters. The maximum amount of parameter values is 50 */
